title: What can I do if my Y536A1 phone breaks down?
answer:
l   Press and hold the power button, and choose **Restart** from the displayed option menu. 

If no option menu is displayed, reinstall the battery and try again. 

l   If your phone breaks down when you are using a third-party application, the application may not be compatible with your phone. 

Restart your phone and uninstall the application. 

l   If the problem persists, back up important data and restore your phone to its factory settings.  

If the problem persists, contact Huawei technical support or take your phone to an authorized Huawei service center.
